activities.name: Shanghai Museum
activities.description: Explore China's rich history through ancient Chinese art and artifacts. The Shanghai museum offers sighting of rare artifacts of the Chinese culture. Exhibits include Ancient Chinese Bronze, Sculpture, Jades, Numismatics, and many more.

activities.name: Guanfu Museum
activities.description: Discover traditional Chinese craftsmanship, antique furniture, ceramics, and calligraphy in this private art museum.

activities.name: Shanghai Foodie Tour
activities.description: Experience authentic local cuisine with guided tastings in hidden alleyways and bustling markets.

activities.name: Culinary Backstreets Tour
activities.description: Explore Shanghai's hidden food gems with expert guides, sampling dishes at family-run eateries.

activities.name: Shanghai Bund Cruise
activities.description: Enjoy a scenic evening cruise along the Huangpu River, offering views of both historic and modern Shanghai.
activities.location: Zhongshan East 1st Rd, The Bund, Shanghai

activities.name: Shanghai Tower Observation Deck
activities.description: Get panoramic views from China's tallest building at the Shanghai Towerâ€™s observation deck.
activities.location: 501 Yincheng Middle Rd, Lujiazui, Pudong, Shanghai

activities.name: Yuyuan Garden
activities.description: Stroll through a classical Chinese garden in the heart of the city, filled with pavilions, ponds, and rockeries.

activities.name: Jade Buddha Temple
activities.description: Visit a serene Buddhist temple housing two jade Buddha statues brought from Burma.

activities.name: French Concession Walk
activities.description: Explore the charming tree-lined streets of Shanghai's historic French Concession district with colonial architecture and local shops.

activities.name: Shanghai Disneyland
activities.description: Experience Disney magic with themed attractions, shows, and entertainment for all ages.

activities.name: Urban Planning Exhibition Center
activities.description: Learn about Shanghai's development through interactive exhibits and a large-scale city model.

activities.name: Propaganda Poster Art Centre
activities.description: View a unique collection of Chinese propaganda posters from the Mao era in this underground gallery.

activities.name: Shanghai Circus World
activities.description: Enjoy a spectacular acrobatic performance showcasing Chinese culture, music, and daring stunts.

activities.name: Shanghai Zoo
activities.description: Visit one of China's oldest zoos, home to diverse wildlife including pandas, big cats, and tropical birds.
